Product Description

Perfect Gift : More Fun. Less Budget

if you are lover of nintendo switch sports games. this accessories kit is the best choice for you, not only will your gaming experience be out of this world and set the bar higher in your gaming experience with a set of sports accessories package kit. it also saving you both time and money with a nicely packaged box.

The bundle including all the items below :

2 * Golf club for Mario Golf Super Rush 2 * Tennis racket for Mario Tennis Ace 2 * Armband for just dance 2 * Leg strap for Ring Fit Adventure 2 * Joncon grip case

Pls Note: The Nintendo Switch console and Joy-Con controllers are not included in the kit.

10 in 1 Switch Sports Accessories

All in 1 switch sports accessories kits for sports game with fair sale costA nicely package box, perfect gift for nintendo switch sports gamer.Save money and time at switch aceessories,more fun,less budget.

Joy-Con Mario Golf Club

Swing the authenic golf club shape, making your mario golf-super rush game more realistic.Easy to set up and adjustable wrist straps for added security.Unique and smooth design to locked in the joy-con

Tennis Rackets for Joy-Con

Smooth design tennis rackets for nintendo switch mario tennis ace.Lightweight ergonomic and perfect size for both kids & adults.Features a secure adjustable wrist strap for safety.

Leg Straps for Ring Fit Adventure

The leg strap is for tracking lower body movement.Adjustable elastic band fits different Size of kids & adults.Easy to use and comfortable wear.

Armbands for Just Dance

Enjoy dancing and release your hands.Easy to adjust according to the size of your wrist.Secure hold of the joy-con during vigorous routines.

Joy-Con Grips with Straps

One model for both sides,the Joy-Con controller grips with an easy access hole.Protective case and adjustable wrist straps for added security.Easy instsallion and comfortable to hold,

Perfect Christmas Gift Ideas

Whenever the festival is approaching and you don’t know what gift to give ?This switch sports accessories bundle will be the best gift for you !Christmas gifts for men, christmas gift for kids,christmas gift for boyfriend,christmas gift for family.Birthday gifts for him,birthday gifts for men,birthday gifts for boyfriend,birthday gifts for kids.

★【 10 In 1 Accessories Kit For Switch Sports 】: The switch assesories kit include whatever you need : 2 x golf clubs, 2 x tennis rackets, 2 x wrist bands, 2 x leg straps, 2 x joy-con cases,.The complete switch assesories kit saves your money and time on searching varieties accessories.
★【 Play Golf at Home 】: Swing the golf club, transform your joycon into Mario Golf Super Rush golf club without any signal delay and signal interference when you play the games, this can bring the simulation game experience to a whole new level.
★【 Unique and Smooth Design 】: Lightweight ergonomic design suitable for both adult and children.Durable and high quality. Easy to set up, just put the Joy-Con into the Dock then you can enjoy your game.
★【 Perfect Gift For Nintendo Switch Player 】: The accessories bundle for switch has everything you need for a perfect gaming experience! Enjoy your game Mario Golf Super Rush,Mario Tennis Ace,Just Dance,Ring Fit Adventure and more. Enhance your gaming experience to a whole new level with this 10 in 1 swtich accessories kit.

From the brand

Women’s Lounge Pants

Casual Pants for Women

UEU is a young leisure sports clothing brand, which to help women to be healthy, full of wisdom and confident in contemporary society. Customer comes the first is our believe.UEU is always devoted to become one of the biggest international women’s casual apparel brand on Amazon.Simple, natural and comfy. All Back to Basic!

How did we get our start?

UEU has been devoted to the field of fashion, but simple sports clothes since 2017.

What makes our products unique?

During production period, each the manufacture process have to be put to the highest standards tests, including apparel technology, fabric softness, elastic, color fastness, chemical smell, ect. We ensure each pcs clothing are qualified before packaged.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team are all passionate, dedicated, hardworking and professional. We hope our customer enjoy life, stay healthy, be happy and confidence, love and be loved every moment.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 21, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B551M3W8

Imported
Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
US Size: S(4-6), M(8-10), L(12-14), XL(16-18),XXL(20-22). Model is wearing a size Small, height is 5’8″. If you are in between size, please select size down.Inseam: 28-29 inch
HIGH QUALITY: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex ，Lightweight, Stretchy, Squat Proof, Buttery Soft, High Waited.
DESIGN: Elastic & high-rise waistband with drawstring for a flexible fit, wide leg design provides a relaxed fit at any time, offers an comfy wear, Full Length,while deep side pockets give you somewhere to keep a hankie or hair elastic.
